original_title: Wales Grand Slam 2012 - RBS 6 Nations Review
overview: This DVD celebrates a remarkable achievement, as Warren Gatland's young side wins a third Grand Slam for Wales in eight years, emulating the success of the legendary Welsh teams of the 1970s.  It charts the dramatic unfolding story of 2012's Six Nations tournament, using a powerful and gripping mix of match action footage, and exclusive never before seen film shot from inside the camp, starting with the ice chamber in Poland and culminating in the amazing scenes in the dressing room after Sam â€˜Captain Courageous' Warburton and the boys beat France.
title: Wales Grand Slam 2012 - RBS 6 Nations Review
